metadata.title: CVE-2022-2519 on Ubuntu 22.10 (kinetic) - medium.
metadata.description:
There is a double free or corruption in rotateImage() at tiffcrop.c:8839 found in libtiff 4.4.0rc1

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2022-2519` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

libtiff-opengl - 4.4.0-4ubuntu3.1
libtiff-tools - 4.4.0-4ubuntu3.1
libtiff5 - 4.4.0-4ubuntu3.1
libtiffxx5 - 4.4.0-4ubuntu3.1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: tiff package in kinetic was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '4.4.0-4ubuntu3.1').
